body.raw:
mutation {
  placeFreightShipmentOrder(
    freightShipmentOrder: {
      sender: {
        countryCode: "FI"
        vatCode: "12345"
        city: "Helsinki"
        email: "test@mail.com"
        logisticsContractNumber: "613601"
        name: "Testi Nimi"
        postalCode: "00220"
        contactName: "Testikontakti Nimi"
        contactType: CORPORATE
        phoneNumber: "+358123456780"
        streetAddress: "Postintaival 1"
      }
      receiver: {
        countryCode: "FI"
        vatCode: "12345"
        city: "Helsinki"
        email: "test@mail.com"
        name: "Testivastaanottaja Nimi"
        postalCode: "00220"
        contactName: "Testivastaanottaja Kontakti"
        contactType: CONSUMER
        phoneNumber: "+358123456780"
        streetAddress: "Postintaival 2"
      }
      shippingProductId: "39729232-15b3-4ca3-91c4-cac2e9acd319"
      shippingUnits: [
        {
          shippingUnitTypeCode: "ZPX"
          count: 1
          width: 80
          length: 120
          height: 100
          weight: 90
          contents: "Pultteja ja muttereita"
          noStacking: true
          dangerousGoodsItems: [
            {
              shippingName: "Vaarallista"
              primaryHazardClass: "3.1"
              environmentalHazard: true
              weight: 10
              technicalName: "Dangerous"
              type: VAK
              count: 1
              unNumber: "0123"
              packagingType: "Muovipussi"
              volume: 20
              secondaryHazardClasses: ["1.4S", "8"]
              packagingGroupCode: "II"
              tunnelRestrictionCode: "B/D"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
      additionalServices: [{ id: "3147" }]
      shippingInstructions: "Kuljeta heti."
      additionalInstructions: "Lis채채 tietoa."
      requestedPickupDate: "2019-12-12T07:00:00Z"
    }
  ) {
    reference
  }
}

body.raw:
query{
  smartShipApiImportPreview {
    totalSenders
    totalReceivers
    previewSenderContacts {
      id
      businessId
      name
      contactName
      streetAddress
      postalCode
      city
      state
      countryCode
      phoneNumber
      email
      doorCode
    }
    previewReceiverContacts {
      id
      businessId
      name
      contactName
      streetAddress
      postalCode
      city
      state
      countryCode
      phoneNumber
      email
      doorCode
    }
  }
}

                                 contactType: CONSUMER,
                                 phoneNumber: "+358123456780",
                                 streetAddress: "Postintaival 2"},
                      deliveryMethod: {pickupPoint: {pupCode: "123"}},
                      additionalServices: [{id: "3147"},

                                                      name: "Testi vastaanottaja",

                      sizeCategory: MEDIUM})
                     {deliveryMethods {pickupPoint postOffice homeDelivery mailbox}
                      additionalServices {id name {lang value} paramsField}
                      sizeCategories returnLabel
                      shippingProducts {id name {lang value}}}}
